attributes.action: Do you think there should be more toll roads on our motorway and more things to stop climate change (global warming)? (To Help SAFE the Earth)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think there should be more toll roads because people aren't changing there ways to STOP Climate change. Help safe the planet. I have got some great Idea’s to help stop Climate Change. If my idea’s was listen to if my help stop climate change. 
Climate is a BIG thing it’s NOT a small thing. We need to do something now NOT later on in the Future! 
I want to try to get people to Thing about want going too happened in the future to their kid, to the grand-kids and so on. Plus the things what we destroying and the animals. If you keep doing what we doing earth going to END up like VENUS and I want them to help STOP global warming. 
Please thing about what thing you can try to HELP stop global warming. 
I want to help stop Climate Change/ Global Warming
 
Let do something BEFORE it’s too LATER
